1601980.name: OneShot: Aftermath
1601980.description:
OneShot: Aftermath is a fan-made sequel to the surreal Puzzle/Adventure game “OneShot”. One year after the events of Solstice, you and Niko find yourselves returning to this world. There will be consequences. Do you wish to proceed?

FEATURES

Along with a complete engine overhaul powered by ModShot, the game boasts optimization
and a graphical upgrade, accompanied by an atmospheric soundtrack.
Upon this, the game also includes:
  • 3 whole new areas inhabited by brand new characters and figures.
  • Gameplay mechanics that go beyond the game window.
  • In depth lore beyond what's even fully presented in-game.
  • Options for better performance and accessibility.
  • Post game Debug-Mode and Gallery.

CONTENT WARNING

Much like OneShot, Aftermath contains aspects of paranoia and heart-string pulling.
Along side this Aftermath has mild language from some NPC's, none of which is excessive however.

Please proceed with caution. - Eternabyte

CLOSING THE GAME WINDOW

Do not worry, it is safe to do so. It only saves your progress.
This has still not changed.
Do not worry.
1601980.supported_languages: 英语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语
